alert.note: Alert for Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 3:28AM EST until January 17 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 1 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches expected. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Strafford County. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 1 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snowfall rates are anticipated, with rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour expected at times. The snow is then expected to change to rain during the late morning and early afternoon. Clogged storm drains may lead to ponding of water on roadways once precipitation changes to rain.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For a more precise forecast for your specific location...go to www.weather.gov/gray..
